dataflowSinks.script:

		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,

		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Pq_ATCFuzzyJun'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SinkPQAtccfuzzy

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		{Rgion Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Rfrence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Dpartement DESC} as string,
		{Dpartement ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantit en UV BL} as string,
		{Anne Prcdente (Quantit en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantit en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantit en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		yearmonth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DSCINPUT
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
DSCINPUT select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Rfrence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Dpartement ID},
		{Quantit en UV BL},
		yearmonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> KeepImportantColumn
columnFormat filter({Quantit en UV BL}!=0) ~> notNullQuantity
KeepImportantColumn derive({Quantit en UV BL} = toDouble({Quantit en UV BL}),
		{Marque Code} = toDouble({Marque Code}),
		year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2)) ~> columnFormat
notNullQuantity filter(locate("Pices dtaches pour chauffage", {Sous Famille})>0) ~> pieceDetache
columnFormat filter({Quantit en UV BL}==0) ~> nullQuantity
notNullQuantity filter(locate("Pices dtaches pour chauffage", {Sous Famille})==0) ~> notPieceDetache
notPieceDetache filter(!isNull({Agence Code})) ~> agenceCodeNotNull
Aggregate1 filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
agenceCodeNotNull, posidNotNull join({Agence Code} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerJoinWithOrga
agenceCodeNotNull, posidNotNull join({Agence Code} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftJoin
fullLeftJoin filter(!isNull({Agence Code})) ~> leftOuter
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth_right = yearmonth,
		Article_right = Article,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qt vente directe} = {Qt vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumn
innerJoinWithOrga, RenameColumn join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Rfrence Article Fournisseur} == Article_right
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerVentesDirecte
innerJoinWithOrga, RenameColumn join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Rfrence Article Fournisseur} == Article_right
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftVentesDirectes
InnerVentesDirecte derive({Quantit en UV BL} = {Quantit en UV BL}-toDouble({Qt vente directe})) ~> removeQuantityVenteDirecte
removeQuantityVenteDirecte select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Rfrence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Dpartement ID},
		{Quantit en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSid,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		BrandID,
		year,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
fullLeftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(yearmonth_right) || isNull(Article_right) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerLeft
outerLeft select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Rfrence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Dpartement ID},
		{Quantit en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSid,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = {Marque DESC},
		sous_famille = {Sous Famille},
		reference = {Rfrence Article Fournisseur},
		agence_code = {Agence Code},
		departement_id = {Dpartement ID},
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantit en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
Select1 derive(departement_id = toDouble(''),
		prix_unitaire_std = toDouble(''),
		distributeur = "DSC") ~> Addcolumn
organisation aggregate(groupBy(POSid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		POSSAMidString = first(POSSAMidString),
		HubSAPid = first(HubSAPid),
		BrandID = first(BrandID)) ~> Aggregate1
Addcolumn, Select2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
pieceDetache sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_PIECE_DETACHEE.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DSCPieceDetache
nullQuantity sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_QTE_NULL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputNullQuantity
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> preparedDSC
leftOuter sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> orgaNotFound

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Reprsentant} as string,
		{N Dpartement} as string,
		{Dpartement} as string,
		{Code point de vente} as string,
		{Libell point de vente} as string,
		{Code Depot source} as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		Client as string,
		{N Siret} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		Ville as string,
		{Anne livraison} as string,
		{Mois livraison} as string,
		{code fournisseur} as string,
		{fournisseur principal} as string,
		{Code produit} as string,
		produit as string,
		{Rference} as string,
		{Qte en unit de vente} as string,
		{Montant prv net} as string,
		path as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
Select1 derive(yearmonth = regexExtract(fileName , '(\\d+)'),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
yearmonth derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5 ,2)) ~> yearAndMonth
yearAndMonth filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
yearAndMonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
ecoulement derive({Reprsentant} = toString(byName('Reprsentant')),
		{N Dpartement} = toString(byName('N Dpartement')),
		{Dpartement} = toString(byName('Dpartement')),
		{Libell point de vente} = toString(byName('Libell point de vente')),
		{N Siret} = toString(byName('N Siret')),
		{Anne livraison} = toString(byName('Anne livraison')),
		{Rference} = toString(byName('Rference')),
		{Qte en unit de vente} = toString(byName('Qte en unit de vente'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code client},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		Ville,
		{Mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Montant prv net},
		{Reprsentant},
		{N Dpartement},
		{Dpartement},
		{Libell point de vente},
		{N Siret},
		{Anne livraison},
		{Rference},
		qte_ecoulement = {Qte en unit de vente},
		fileName = path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Code point de vente})) ~> codePointVenteNotNull
organisation derive(POSid = trim(POSid, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
posidNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
codePointVenteNotNull, organisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth_right = yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qt ventes directes} = {Qt vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Rference} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Rference} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = qte_ecoulement-toDouble({Qt ventes directes})) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		{Code postal},
		marque_file = {fournisseur principal},
		article = produit,
		ca_ecoulement = {Montant prv net},
		{Reprsentant},
		departement_id = {N Dpartement},
		reference = {Rference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		UnitID,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
enleverVentesDirectes, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(canal = '',
		distributeur = "vf_confort") ~> Addcolumn
